sentences.sContent: Hey, Beethoven: Get a full-time job, a part-time business, a spouse, a few kids, and a menagerie of pets and wait till you see how many symphonies you can crank out!
sentences.sContent_eng: Hey, Beethoven: Get a full-time job, a part-time business, a spouse, a few kids, and a menagerie of pets and wait till you see how many symphonies you can crank out!
sentences.sCn: 嘿，贝多芬：找到一个全职工作，兼职经商，一个配偶，几个孩子，和一个动物园的宠物，然后等待看你能够制造出多少交响乐。

sentences.sContent: The coffers were filled not only with the standard treasures and artifacts but a menagerie of wild African animals including ostriches and giraffes to be sent back to the emperor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The coffers were filled not only with the standard treasures and artifacts but a menagerie of wild African animals including ostriches and giraffes to be sent back to the emperor.
sentences.sCn: 这样，船队中不只是装着金银珠宝和工艺品，还有小型动物园，里面有来自非洲的动物，如鸵鸟和长颈鹿都被带到南京，敬献给皇帝。

sentences.sContent: The 18-year-old studied animal management before taking a full-time role looking after her parents giant menagerie which houses more than 120 animals.
sentences.sContent_eng: The 18-year-old studied animal management before taking a full-time role looking after her parents giant menagerie which houses more than 120 animals.
sentences.sCn: 这个18岁的女孩在她父母豢养了超过120只动物的大动物园里全职工作，在此之前，她学习动物管理学。

synos.tran: 动物园；动物展览；（马戏团豢养的）兽群
